Music and Sports Venue Accessibility

Purpose

Welcome to Accessibilty in Music and Sports Venues! The purpose of this webpage is to help people with disabilities find music/sports venues that are accessible in Chicago, Illinois. Each page on this site will focus on one specific venue and give details on the accessibilty for that venue. In addition, I have included a page comparing accessibility services between the venues. I created this page so that everyone can enjoy the thirll of concerts and live sporting events. I also created this page so that the information was easily accessible for all. I wanted the information to be all in one place so that people did not have to visit multiple sites to find the information they were looking for. I hope you find this site helpful!

Venues Featured

Allstate Arena

Allstate Arena is located in Rosemont, Illinois right near Oâ€™Hare airport. This venue hosts a variety of events ranging from concerts to Chicago Wolves Hockey Games.

Source

Chicago Theater

Chicago Theater is located centrally in downtown Chicago, Illinois. The venue hosts a variety of events including concerts, broadway plays and comedy shows.

Source

Guaranteed Rate Field

Guaranteed Rate Field is located on the South Side of Chicago, Illinois. Guaranteed Rate Field is the home of the Chicago White Sox and occasionally hosts concerts in the summertime. The most recent concert hosted here was Chance the Rapper in 2016.

Source

Soldier Field

Soldier Field is located on the lakefront in Chicago, Illinois. Soldier field is the home of the Chicago Bears and the Chicago Fire just recently relocated to Soldier Field. The venue also hosts concerts during the summertime.

Source

United Center

United Center is located in Chicago, Illinois. This venue hosts a variety of events ranging from concerts to sporting events. It is also home to the Chicago Blackhawks and the Chicago Bulls.

Source

Wrigley Field

Wrigley Field is located on the North Side of Chicago, Illinois. Wrigley Field is the home of the Chicago Cubs and also hosts a variety of concerts in the summertime. Tours of the field are also available.

Source

Contact

For more information about the different venues and their accessibilty services feel free to contact me and I can help you get in touch with guest services for each venue.

I can be reached at eleanorhoran1203@gmail.com
